parseEvent(DocumentSnapshot, OnCompleteListener<Event>) - Method in class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Model.Database
Given some DocumentSnapshot from the "Event" collection, this method takes the fields from that document and manually matches it up with the fields from the event class, giving us fine control over what is added to what fields in this class

ProfileUIFragment - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.View
Displays the user's information and allows edits Fetches the user's name, email, and phone number if it exists and displays it Allows the user to view history by navigating to UserEventHistoryFragment, to confirm updates to their information with the update profile button, and to delete their profile by navigating to DeleteProfileFragment
